name: European Dignity Watch
memberOrga: EDW is not a membership-based organisation. The only structure that has members is the governing board with 5 natural persons.
goal: Human rights advocacy, advancing human dignity, freedom, and the family.
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Development, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Home Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
euInitiatives:
Hate speech legislation. Code of Conduct for IT companies.
Rule of Law Mechanism
Bioethical files
